pages.title: Immortal Substance
pages.text: The Immortal Substance is a mysterious essence that grants the user immortality, making them invulnerable to death. However, this power comes with a warning: be careful with this essence, as it may bring unintended consequences.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The Immortal Substance can be crafted in a Somnium Infuser using loran energy and somnium as ingredients.

pages.heading: Recipe
pages.text1: Place Somnium and loran energy in the upper input slots.
pages.text2: To craft Immortal Essence, place the required items in the test tubes on the left and right.
